name: Hit that
description:
Controls:

Mouse: Left Click to move left, right click to move right. Thats it

Oh yes, OwO happens, check the bottom right of your screen.

It is recommended that one downloads the game and plays it, music and ui stuff ain't showing up in the web version.

Is this game very unfinished? Yes it is.

Could it be better? Definitely.

Is the Banner and Background done with Paint? No comment.
